p: The elevated Bax/Bcl-2 ratio aroused the assessment of the expression levels of the pro-apoptotic active caspase-3, caspase-9 and p53 tumour suppressor protein. Treatment of HepG2 cells with spirooxindole 6a resulted in a significant elevation in the expression levels of caspase-3, caspase-9 and p53 proteins by about 8.88, 12.27 and 10.03 folds, respectively, compared to control ( Table 4).
